title: Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
subtitle: Online | 2-Day Workshop
description: Join our hands-on workshop to learn the fundamentals of Machine Learning. We'll cover everything from data preprocessing to building your first predictive model using Python and popular libraries like Scikit-learn.

title: AI for Social Good Global Summit 2024
subtitle: Virtual Event | 3 Days
description: A global gathering of researchers, innovators, and policymakers to discuss how AI can be leveraged to address the world's most pressing challenges, from climate change to public health.

title: The Ethics of AI: Navigating the Future
subtitle: Live Panel Discussion
description: A thought-provoking discussion with leading experts on the ethical implications of artificial intelligence. We'll explore topics like bias, privacy, and accountability in AI systems.
